LanguageData.ATR_DoEmergencyMaintenance.label: Do makeshift maintenance
LanguageData.ATR_DoEmergencyMaintenance.description: Use parts to repair severe maintenance flaws. Since maintenance is primarily an internal activity, this can only bring it to 40%.
LanguageData.ATR_ReprogramDrone.label: reprogram drone
LanguageData.ATR_ReprogramDrone.description: A straightforward but delicate operation, reprogramming drones to suit the colony's purposes is an excellent way to strengthen capabilities. However, the previous owners may have installed safeguards against such operations, so there is a high risk of death should it fail.
